remarks: A subgroup acts on its parent group.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 13-Aug-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)
statement:
subgga.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
subgga.2 $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
subgga.3 $e |- H = ( G |`s Y ) $.
subgga.4 $e |- F = ( x e. Y , y e. X |-> ( x .+ y ) ) $.
subgga $p |- ( Y e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> F e. ( H GrpAct X ) ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
